Supercharge Your Apps: Agents & WhatsApp Are Here:
Agents are the new way to supercharge your Base44 apps. Agents don't just chat; they can look up information, update your data, trigger backend functions, and more. Think of them as AI assistants that you can install inside your app that don't just talk, they take action.


Now we're taking that power directly to you on Whatsapp Imagine getting instant updates, checking project status, managing entries, or receiving important reminders, all within your existing conversations where you already chat. This new integration means zero setup overhead for you, as Base conveniently supplies the necessary numbers. You'll enjoy rich conversations using text, images, and voice messages, just like within Base44, with a single click launching your chat with an agent. Experience unparalleled convenience and efficiency, connecting with your Base44 agents wherever you are.
